DOC.brief_summary: Liposomal bupivacaine novel local anesthetic design prolonged pain relief . Despite long-acting analgesic potential , liposomal bupivacaine significantly expensive local anesthetic alternative . The primary aim investigation examine whether liposomal bupivacaine provide superior pain relief clinically significant opioid-sparing effect versus control justify cost .
